content.rendered:
The False Bay FET College, False Bay Prospectus consists;

  • Acronyms and definitions
  • Course and courses information
  • Campus facilities and usage
  • Accommodation, and residence application
  • Schools fees/tuitions
  • Financial support and bursaries
  • Entry requirements
  • False Bay admission process.

You can use the information contained within these prospectuses to find suitable courses and apply for admission to study at the False Bay FET College (False Bay).

  • False Bay TVET College Student Portal Login – www.falsebaycollege.co.za

Note: The False Bay prospectus is very important especial for new applicants, it gives a more comprehensive understanding of your application.

False Bay FET College Prospectus 2024

False Bay Prospectus has been uploaded to the official website, www.falsebay.org.za and can be downloaded in PDF format.

  • FALSE BAY PROSPECTUS 2024 – PDF DOWNLOAD
